name: Third Order Mist Frame

name: Icy Core
description: Use the heat from the Heart of the Destroyer in Mount Maelstrom to fuse 10 Piles of Bloodstone Dust with an Icy Core to form Gelid Paste.

name: Gift of Tarir
description: In the Mystic Forge, combine a Gift of the Fleet, a Gift of Tarir, a Gift of the Chak, and a Gift of the Jungle to create a Gift of Maguuma, used in crafting legendary weapons.

description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the Forgotten, Sariss Yassith.</c>
